entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as getting up and crossing to the door.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as speaking pleasantly to Lucius Malfoy.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student's father, mentioned as bursting into the room with fury in his face.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is cowering under Lucius Malfoy's arm, heavily wrapped in bandages.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Dumbledore are associated with each other as they are both present in the same room.
Lucius Malfoy owns Dobby, a house-elf who is cowering under his arm.
Dumbledore protects Harry Potter as he is the headmaster of Hogwarts and has a responsibility to ensure the safety of students.
Lucius Malfoy opposes Dumbledore, as indicated by his cold eyes fixed on him.
